overview: This file controls the item modifiers for Set bonus statistics when the player has equipped enough Set Items

data_fields.name: name
data_fields.description: Uses a string for displaying the Set name in the inventory tooltip

data_fields.name: version
data_fields.description: Defines which game version to use this Set bonus (0 = Classic mode | 100 = Expansion mode)

data_fields.name: PCode2a (to PCode5a)
data_fields.description: Controls the each of the different pairs of Partial Set item properties. These are applied when the player has equipped the related # of Set items. This is the first part of the pair for each Partial Set bonus. (Uses the “code” field from Properties.txt)

data_fields.name: PParam2a (to PParam5a)
data_fields.description: The stat’s “parameter” value associated with the relative property (PCode#a). Usage depends on the property function (See the “func” field on Properties.txt)

data_fields.name: PMin2a (to PMin5a)
data_fields.description: The stat’s “min” value associated with the listed relative (PCode#a). Usage depends on the property function (See the “func” field on Properties.txt)

data_fields.name: PMax2a (to PMax5a)
data_fields.description: The stat’s “max” value to assign to the listed relative (PCode#a). Usage depends on the property function (See the “func” field on Properties.txt)

data_fields.name: PCode2b (to PCode5b)
data_fields.description: Controls the each of the different pairs of Partial Set item properties. These are applied when the player has equipped the related # of Set items. This is the second part of the pair for each Partial Set bonus. (Uses the “code” field from Properties.txt)

data_fields.name: PParam2b (to PParam5b)
data_fields.description: The stat’s “parameter” value associated with the relative property (PCode#b). Usage depends on the property function (See the “func” field on Properties.txt)

data_fields.name: PMin2b (to PMin5b)
data_fields.description: The stat’s “min” value associated with the listed relative (PCode#b). Usage depends on the property function (See the “func” field on Properties.txt)

data_fields.name: PMax2b (to PMax5b)
data_fields.description: The stat’s “max” value to assign to the listed relative (PCode#b). Usage depends on the property function (See the “func” field on Properties.txt)

data_fields.name: FCode1 (to FCode8)
data_fields.description: Controls the each of the different Full Set item properties. These are applied when the player has all Set item pieces equipped (Uses the “code” field from Properties.txt)

data_fields.name: FParam1 (to FParam8)
data_fields.description: The stat’s “parameter” value associated with the relative property (FCode#b). Usage depends on the property function (See the “func” field on Properties.txt)

data_fields.name: FMin1 (to FMin8)
data_fields.description: The stat’s “min” value associated with the listed relative (FCode#b). Usage depends on the property function (See the “func” field on Properties.txt)

data_fields.name: FMax1 (to FMax8)
data_fields.description: The stat’s “max” value to assign to the listed relative (FCode#b). Usage depends on the property function (See the “func” field on Properties.txt)
